content.detailedDescription: Our family was on our annual camping trip pulled off highway to camp for night on very un traveled road shot some rabbits while driving in for future meal stopped made camp while mother was making sandwiches for dinner myself and my dad cleaned rabbits we noticed a foul smell not to bad at first but got very bad as night progressed so bad made me sick to my stomach went outside camper to use bathroom noticed glowing light behind camper was not there when we stopped no cars or town for miles in this area in morning no smell no animals no reptiles nothing touched rabbit guts that i walked out of camp and through as far as i could they were still in the paper sack very odd being in the desert
content.summary: Glowing light foul smell for very long period of time this was in very remote area

content.detailedDescription: Outside our house on 8/9/2015 about 6 am getting ready to leave for work. i noticed a bright light and thought it may have been venus until it disappeared. we recorded it going from bright to dim and changing shapes from a bright circle to a diamond shape, from being far away to making itself bigger with a much clearer up closer view, it also was moving extremely fast all over the place but also with remaining in the same area. it also stayed in the sky until after sunrise. i recorded up until i had to start work. i haven't ever seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Glowing shape changing orb of light

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were at the fireworks in linglestown on july 5th 2015. i noticed a red light hovering during the fireworks. i thought it was odd and was recording it on my phone. i asked my girlfriend and 3 year old son if they seen it and they also saw it. it stayed almost motionless until the conclusion of the event. everyone was clearing out of the park at which we were viewing, but my family stood still watching. less than two minutes after the fireworks ended the red light took off at a very rapid speed almost straight up in the air. my sceptical girlfriend was flabbergasted and worried.

one month later in mid august, att my home in lower paxton township, myself, my girlfriend and two friends were outside trying to spot some luck from the meteor shower. we were relaxing and conversing on a beautiful evening. my friend says he has been looking at a star for 5 minutes and all of a sudden it started moving slowly so we should look up. we all four observed it move slowly across the sky. i kept remarking how bright it was and the fact that it was not blinking whatsoever. i thought for safety reasons aircraft needed to blink. after about three minutes of it moving slowly in one direction, it made a 90 degree turn(on a dime) and sped off quickly in that direction. i am starting to get freaked out.
content.summary: Red light hovering near fireworks. i do not know how to zoom or edit this video. would love to know it's nothing worrisome.

content.detailedDescription:
The blue lights.....

this has been going on for at least 20 years. back in the mid 90's driving around 10 pm outside ottawa, canada, i noticed blue lights off to my right...Before the blue lights i looked at clock in my car and it was around 10 pm....When i looked at my clock again...Almost an hour had passed but i was still on the same spot of the highway...Thought something was odd but dismissed it...Moving forward...I moved from ontario to british columbia in the late 90's and every location i moved to the blue lights (2 small orbs buzzing around)always made an appearance and always in the middle of the night....Now get ready for this....About a year ago my kids were staying over and my son awoke in the morning (he was sleeping in my bed) and said that blue lights woke him up last night and he went into his sister's room....  i nearly fell off of the couch...I live on the 8th floor of an apartment tower so this is not some reflection off the street.I do not fear the blue lights but they always make an appearance and to be honest i look forward to the next visit.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blue lights - small orbs buzzing around the room - reoccurring over decades

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out report with witness on the phone at mufon hq. by field investigator l. flechtner on 9/9/2015
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
in 1997, while living in la verne, i went outside to smoke and saw a bright star that had colors on it, when  i flashed a mag light on it, it came towards me and hovered overhead.
i had seen this star five nights in a row and it seemed to have red, blue and yellow colors to it. it didn't move in the sky like a normal star. it had seemed to be stationary over bracket field. it seemed to be about 5 miles high when i flashed the flashlight at it. it descended in a straight ling and then moved in a straight line towards me, dropped again and hovered over me. it was partly cloudy that night but we had a bright moon. it was 350' long, and looked like the fuselage of an airplane. it had a tail like a 737 and little wings on both sides towards the middle. it appeared to be fragile, and had lines on it like a zeppelin. it was a golden burnished bronze color. after 15 minutes it returned to its original place over bracket field. it moved in a straight line path and then ascended upward and moved in a straight line path until it was in its original position. 
the next night, in the middle of the night, my girlfriend woke me up screaming. she had seen two men in camouflage outside our window with equipment. 
i have felt someone has been following me.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
the second sighting was at the same place and i was outside in 1997. in december early morning before dawn. i had just gotten off work and parked the car and was walking to my house when i saw the craft across the street hovering over a roof, a triangle shaped craft. it was creamy white with lights on the bottom of it, about 5 white lights. it goes upward about 1,000' and turns, i can see 15 led bright blue lights on the very back of the craft. it made a low rumbling sound as it warped away.
i know it has been a long time but maybe someone else saw something also.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: In 1997 i went outside to smoke and saw a star that had colors on it, when  i flashed a mag light on it, it came towards me and hovered overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
It was completely dark out about 10:00 pm. laying on our backs on recliners
  drinking coffee. three small stars came together, not touching but close enough for them to see each other. at this tine i asked my wife if she saw it and she said yes. we watched this for about 2 minutes and then they left the same way they came. i was quite sure it was a ufo because stars and planes comets shooting stars don't move like that.
  we were quite suprised.
  when they left, it was very fast i might add they left one at a time,
  same way they came. there was no time to get a camera or any thing for that matter. our plans were not to view ufo's at the time
content.summary: Our back deck, over head,looked like little stars (3) from different directions

content.detailedDescription: I was using the google earth software on my pc (not the web page). i just came across it purely by chance... it's on there for all to see, i just think i'm the first... on google earth go to (53°20'18.52"n 2°39'55.59"w) and zoom in to about 1500ft and see for yourself! i will volunteer that i have seen this ufo before in different years. but will only speak to you about this...
content.summary: Chance photo taken of ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Again you have to go to my facebook page to see this wondrous video, you never see another one this close like it.  this thing was huge' with the most brilliant lights and beams of blue light shooting down, alarms going off everywhere the whole time.  he has documented proof, day and hour that this took place in lacey washington.
content.summary: This was the most incredible realalistic sighting, next to the one i personally seen in 2000 you must try to see this video for youeself, it is on my facebook under nahomtima sheila lossing leflau. my friend who shot this video name is daniel rendon

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone at mufon hq, by field investigator l. flechtner on 9/9/2015
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
i take pictures while i'm driving and afterword i looked at them and saw a blue silver sphere keeping track with me in all the pictures, and i was going 50 mph.

i was driving about 50 mph taking pictures out of my drivers side window, when i looked at the pictures later i saw a blue/silver round object in the pictures keeping pace with me. this was on the highway 64 between ben wheeler and canton. i am guessing it was 13 inches big and about 3 feet from my truck. it had some windows on it and had a matte finish, almost looked like a hologram, a little transparent. i have pictures.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
another sighting i had was in april 10th, 2015 at 12 am, in an indian battlefield off highway 64 and between ben wheeler and canton. it's on private  property but the owners let people in so see the memorial. i was taking pictures and saw two disks and 9 orbs and another orb with a face on it, looked like a hologram of a face. the orbs were in the west facing the sun. they were black with white on the bottoms. i have pictures.
content.summary: I was driving about 50 mph taking pictures out of my drivers side window, when i looked at the pictures later i saw a blue/silver round object in the pictures keeping pace with me.

content.detailedDescription:
I was photographing the smoke from wildfires and taking short bursts of images and uploading them to my facebook page.  when i went to facebook to add text about how far the smoke was (about 7 miles) i scrolled through the images and was astonished to find a single image with a flying object in it. it appears in 1 only of my photos, it has to be a huge craft because of it's location between me and the fires.  although in the image it is clearly seen,  i never saw it with my own eyes. 


  realizing it looked a lot like a shoe i re-walked the path in front of my house and can swear to you there was no shoe hanging from the wires, or any other thing visible.

   i sent the photos to my friend paul postma who is somewhat of a techno image nerdish type (i am strictly a taker of video/photos there is no artist in me.  
   paul analyzed the images with a bunch of filters and was able to see some type of energy surrounding the object when he did that.

   i was really going to blow this off, until two days ago when i walked out to my back yard because there was a very loud aircraft out there.  the craft was causing my trees to sway and when i went out it blew my hair a lot, but there was nothing there.  i could see nothing, but i could hear and feel it.
content.summary: I was photographing the smoke from wildfires and taking short bursts of images in 1 only a huge craft is clearly seen. it was not tere to the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work this morning at 4:45 am. and i saw a very bright blue object streak across the sky. i thought it was a meteorite at first but the color didn't fit.  the trail behind it was the same color. it flew into the clouds and lit them up very bright. it lasted about 5 seconds. cloud cover obscured it or maybe it burned up in the atmosphere. it was an awesome experience and i wish i could have gotten a video of it.
content.summary: Very fast bright blue object with a trail behind it flew through the clouds and lit them up  very brightly.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving home on interstat 80 by loomis ca. it was overcast somewhat sun was on horizon but there was this really bright patch of light not near the sun. my friend whom was driving told me to take a picture of that light. i said i was looking at it and didnt want to say anything because shes not the ufo enthusiast i am and she gives me crap about it all the time. anyhow i just started snapping pics we were going 65 mph and i just started snapping. 
         we didnt see any objects just the bright light and what i sent you was on them
content.summary: Overcast with a bright light snaped pics and this object was there

content.detailedDescription: sitting on back porch on my farm enjoying the evening, and was watching the sky to the southeast as sometimes we have planes or heliocopters flying in that direction.  suddenly began observing an object that remained in one area of the sky and at first thought it might be a plane in a holding position, but it is not near any airport.  it continued to remain there and then another object suddenly appeared below it and slowly  rose toward it, hovered for a few minutes and disappeared abruptly.  neither were airplanes or heliocopters as i grew up around aircraft with my father owning airplanes.  i have also studied astronomy at the university of oregon.  these objects did not fit into any known classification that i know.  the lights were brilliant.  i looked through bionoculars that i ran into the house and got.  just as i adjusted them and spotted the main object that had appeared first and had remained when the second one left i could quickly see that is was round with a lighted dome on top which was filled with yellow light.  as soon as i saw it, it disppeared.  three weeks before this time a very large craft flew overhead filling the sky that my husband saw coming home from work at 2:27 a.M. on a wednesday three weeks before this sighting.  i was asleep but woke to lights rotating around my front yard.  i thought they were car lights although none had ever shown through my yard like that.  i stayed in bed unfortlunately as my husband saw the object from his car and said it filled the sky, was round with lights all around it like fog lights.  the moon was full that night and i asked him where he saw it as i knew where the moon was positioned at that hour and he kept sawing the moon was orange but it was not.  it would have been white.  one week later someone reported to our small paper that they had seen an orange object and wandered if anyone else had seen thus assuring that my husband had seen something.  the night of my sighting he said he saw the object again.  he wouldn't give me any details as he insists it must be military.  most usually say this as they cannot accept the possibility of an actual ufo.  i have had two other sightings in my life many years back.  i never believed until i had one.  the first one was in may of 1973 between homedale, id and jordan valley, or and someone reported it in vale, or.  there was a time loss in that sighting for me and a large, round burn mark appeared later on the inside of my left forearm.  the doctor did not know what it was.  i was somewhat fearful for sometime afterward.  i never reported it.  the other was in florida in 1989 summertime and there were a lot of sightings going on and friends wanted me to go watch them and i refused.  i was working in a restaurant called 'the yearling' at cross creek, florida when the electric shut off just as i was leaving work.  i went outside to get into my pickup and noticed only that side of the road was without electric.  just as i was driving down the road an object thirty to forty feet above the ground slowly moved overhead following the road.  it had three red lights behind it and made no sound.  i kept driving and watching until it stopped over a dense area of woods where i saw a large red glow.  i stopped the truck for a while, but thought i had better not go any closer so i left and went home as i wanted nothing to do with it.  i have never reported these two incidents as who would take me seriously?  i only know that i was a disbeliver before my first observation.  thank you for listening to me.
content.summary: Spotted in direction of ohio river near power plant to the left.  saw vapor rising up to it.  possibly water from river.

content.detailedDescription: Did anyone see the aura like thing last night at 1:30 or so am.? it changed shape so many times and came out of nowhere! clouds were miles away and it was like a coil spring shape then to a flat noodle shape twirling in a circle heading to the west with silver and blue,yellow, red colors! it lasted for about 20 minutes or so. just amazing!
content.summary: Have never seen anything like this at all! like a aura but more different.

content.detailedDescription:
This report was filled out with witness on the phone by field investigator l. flechter, on sept. 9th, 2015, at mufon hq.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
while driving on the 10 freeway near desert center, i saw four objects in the sky.
it was 7:17 pm and i was taking pictures of a sunset that appeared to be taking place on the eastern sky. it had rays of sun and a bright center. i saw four objects in the sky. the one nearest to me, on the south side of the freeway, resembled the space shuttle and was close to the ground. it was gray and black. i could only see dots for the other three on the north side of the freeway. i watched them for 10 minutes and took pictures with my phone. they were 45 degrees to 90 degrees in the sky, traveling from west to east.

a second sighting was on july 31st. in moreno valley. it happened near swan street and pidgin pass. it was 9:30 pm and i saw a white light in the southeastern sky. it was as large as a football field, but only lasted for seconds. it was about 1 mile high from me and 5 miles high. it was a clear dark night. the white light resembled a large alien face with the big eyes and triangular face. don't know what that was.
content.summary: While driving on the 10 freeway near desert center, i saw four objects in the sky, one nearest to me resembled the space shuttle and was close to the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
I was campimg long time ago with a bunch of friends i was fighting my own personal demons at this time  or you might say i was in the mist of them.
anyway some one contacted me along time ago about this by  a phone call 
at the time it was my daughters birthday party i could not talk that day and i never heard from them again . the only reason i am bring this up is that mufon remined me of this event witch im probally lieing to my self  
i was watching hangor one and this britsh couple was walking down the street
 and this light  like a flood light englufes them this is what happened to me 
 as i said we were camping and getting lit having fun before i saw anything me and some freinds were on the mountain and  i saw a shooting star  high above us it looked like it was in space  like a shooting star it traveled in a straight line  the reason this sticks out is i pionted it out to my friends im still not sure if they saw it .After  were having fun i rember peices of this now and my freinds will not colaberate this one has pasted now i know what this sounds like reenforce dolusions i have nvr been diganose with any metal illness nore do i belive i have one. so back to the story this happened at the camp site  i was running around having fun  their was a hill  not a very big hill  but like an steep incline 40 degrees maybe 45 degrees  with trees around  pine tree tall ones so me and one of my freinds started to go up this  small hill and a light came from the trees  bright blinding light i rember looking up at this light i rember saying to myself wow whos up in the tree with a flood light my instink took over i backed away from the light i realy dont rember much after that except at one piont i wanted to bolt but i was like were am i gonna go also i rember looking at one of my freinds from behind and he looked menacing  from behind i put my hand on his shoulder because my mind was playing tricks on me  when i looked in his face it was my freind next thing i rember is my freinds put me in a my pup tent this is an on going joke with one of my friends  i said look im a turtle trapped in my shell but this is a memory i have and no matter what anyone says to me the light thing happened to me and your hanger one epasode made me think about it again i have reported one other sighting to mufon awhile ago about orbs on the forth of july i believe 4 years ago that were problly those fire lanterns mufon published it in monthly magazines excepte mufon said it happened in long island grr
content.summary: Light in trees

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear day with bright sunshine, and in the middle of the afternoon. i was ten years of age. my parents were in a shoe store in bennington, vermont. i was outside of the store with a young woman that was a friend of the family. we were alone together, and there was no one else in the area. we were talking to one another, and then both of us turned to notice a dark metallic disc with a dome protrusion on the top that was hovering about five hundred feet away. it was about thirty feet across. it hovered there about forty feet off of the ground. there was no sound emanating from the object. we both were enthusiastic about what we were seeing, and there was no doubt that this was an unidentified flying object. after watching the disc for about one minute, i told the young woman that was with me to go into the store, and to tell everyone to come out and see this. the disc proceeded directly towards me, hovered for a moment, and then exited the sky to my left in a non-ballistic motion. no one else was a witness to this event besides this young woman and myself. by the time that the other people in the store came outside, it was gone. my father was engaged in classified government research on psychic phenomenon at the association for research and enlightenment, and was the author of several books on the subject. i have seen the side of classified government research on extraterrestrial visitation that the majority of people are not aware of. if one becomes too proficient in the research on the psychic transfer of thought processes, mental telepathy, there is a welcoming committee of classified information safeguards. unfortunately, this is also inclusive of threats of lethal force to remain silent. the research by the government to assemble the database of people that have seen unidentified flying objects is why i waited so long before initiating a report. the security mandates are overwhelming, and i have ended up a destroyed man. the specificity in conscious memory in detail of the event is difficult to come by. this seems to have happened as a means of terminating my credibility to communicate my experiences that would be outside of the regulation to control disclosures by the government personnel that are in a purported authorized capacity. in the year of nineteen eighty four, i was made destitute by members of my family. i ended up in the state of hawaii under duress without recourse. after having been to hawaii island for about two weeks, one night i was in a field next to hilo international airport. three dirigibles appeared overhead, and were surrounded by a mist. this was likely liquid nitrogen. this had to have been given formal clearance with the airport administration, as the event was in the airspace. one of the dirigibles lightly collided with one of the others, and then they drifted away out of view. there has been a multi-million dollar expense to try to confuse the issue with me about the vermont incident. i was supposed to attribute this to my personal worth, and it became clear to me of the attempt to develop a systematic process instead. after recently reading a fraudulent newspaper article 'mass sightings of ufo's over the skies of mexico', the elaborate conspiracy to control the credibility of a witness began to become a reasonable cause to suspect. there are some people of wealth that feel wrongfully excluded from inclusion in the activities of these alien beings. this has escalated into making an example out of anyone that has seen a genuine unidentified flying object at a personal discretion. ensuring the safeguards has become a means to an end to use witnesses as a form of a classified leverage to obtain a vertical influence from within an intelligence agency. this now extends to any manner of a personal disclosure that is external to the accepted channels, and i do not think that the majority of people are aware of this type of jeopardy. maintaining secrecy can be a good thing in the protection of the integrity of information or specific identity, but i am of the persuasion that it is costing innocent people their very lives instead: trust is being violated. alien visitation always has a purpose to it. the greatest leverage against the exceptional harassment for having seen a u.F.O. is the public awareness that would terminate the ulterior influence that is responsible for it. a loss of respect from a public disdain would disarm the interest to censure witnesses to continue. i suspect that there are quite a few people that have been hopelessly confused as to why they have become subjected to threats, and this terminates a desire to be further involved. this is the tactic that is being used towards the objective to restrict access. the more that people can be made to be confused as to how to approach this in turn makes an organized resistance more difficult to actualize. it is a vicious circle of a self reinforcing justification to prevent an organized objective counterpoint. a system of authority should welcome the checks and balances to ensure the integrity involved, and not make examples out of innocent people for trying. it is up to each person to determine the implications of this.
content.summary: Outside a shoe store in broad daylight, noticed hovering disc about 500 feet away, about thrity feet across. no sound, exited the sky in non-ballistic motion.

content.detailedDescription: It was the end of summer beach party. it had just gotten  dark. i noticed what was an orange light, at first i thought it was a plane, but then i notice it had no blinking lights. so i grabbed my camera to take a few photos. the object  moved down the beach over the water, in a slow hovering type way. i thought for sure it was going to float on by the people i was with.  then as the light got to me,   as if it  knew i had a camera the light faded and the object moved in an upward direction, faded out of sight.  a few minutes later i went back to the people i was with  and my daughter said to me hey dad do you see that moving star, why is that star moving. so the object was now over head and looked like a star slowly traversing the night sky.  this is now at least the 5th-10th one i have witnessed over the past 6 years. i have taken photos of a few, and they mostly come out blurry. i have no reaction to the sighting, people around me don't notice until i point it out, so i don't point them out to people any more.
content.summary: On nauset beach saw orange light hovering above the water going north direction

content.detailedDescription: Walking on golf course in my community i reside in and i came around a corner into a utility easement that runs east and west towards shearon harris nuclear power plant. i believe that is about 5-7 miles away but you can see the top of the cooling tower in the distance.  as i came around the corner, i looked up and maybe a mile?? in the sky there was a hovering light. i had headphones on so i couldn't hear anything. i stared at it thinking it was a helicopter. i finally took my phones off and realized it was making no sound - very strange. thinking this was an "osprey" or helicopter still, i then watched it completely disappear. i became very cold like some sort of entity had been in that area….The air became much cooler like a draft blew in and i got chills …maybe from fear but it was in the low 70's this am.  i headed home and on the way back after i had exited the golf course, i again looked up and saw what i thought was the same object in the distance. i recorded a video of the craft doing what i saw closer up earlier but this time it was now in the distance …. it again hovered then disappeared. was it the same thing i had seen earlier, i have no idea.
content.summary: Walking on golf course pre dawn, i saw an object race across the sky then hover then disappear

content.detailedDescription: i was driving to the sparks marina with my family. we had just recieved a new go pro type camera and wanted to try it out.  we had attached it to the window of our car and set it to take a photo every 3 seconds.  upon returning home and going through the photos is when we came across the ufo.  it is only in one picture, meaning it had appeared in the frame of view for less than 3 seconds. never saw it with the naked eye
content.summary: Captured photo will driving with go pro like camera

content.detailedDescription: Arrived home and exited my vehicle.  i glanced up at the stars and was shocked to see several very bright ones off to the west.  as i looked at them i realized they were moving in my direction.  at first they were just above the horizon, but in about 30 seconds or so, they got close enough to me that i grabbed my phone and tried to video them.  the quality of the picture is very poor, and does not appear nearly as bright as they were to the naked eye.  they did not blink like aircraft but were a steady amber light.  they seemed to follow single file slightly back and forth like follow-the-leader.  as they got closer, i ran into the house and woke my wife, telling her there was a "flock of ufo's outside.  she ran outside with me and we watched as they flew nearly overhead and moved off the the east-north-east direction.  we heard a plane noise getting louder and turned to the south spotting a plane approaching.  as it got louder and closer it had lights out on its wingtips and flashing belly lights and was moving in the direction the balls had exited from.  it appeared to be twice there size but at about the same altitude.  i would say three to five thousand feet up, but far less than say twenty thousand feet like an airliner.  these were much lower than an airliner.
content.summary: Line of glowing balls single file following-the-leader traveling slowly from west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard with a girlfriend at the time. i lived in a 3 story town home with a wooden fence around me. so i had to look up at least 20 to 30 degrees when sitting down to look out. but it was about 9 or 10pm and we had made a small bonfire that night. we both were just talking casually. i happen to be looking up and to the left and i saw five lights in a triable shape heading west at a very fast speed that made no sound. my subdivision intersects rt207 and 95. it was traveling east to west and looked to be about 3 or 4000 feet if i had to guess. ap hill army base is about 20 minutes north of my location.

on a side note that doesn't have to do with aliens. i observed a white aircraft that was flying very low without any beacon lights on and made about seven passes around my house and was flying about 2 to 3000 feet. my brother also observed the same aircraft and he lives in lake caroline about 10 minutes south of my location. the airplane looked the same size as 737. the significance of this was it was flying low without any lights on and was going in a circular and was about 2 months before the malaysian airplane disappearance.
content.summary: Observed five white lights in triangle pattern heading west

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I just saw a star-like ufo strange sighting in the sky in the gogal, margao at the place where i leaves...!!~
it was just not moving.... it was just like a bright star..!!~~ it was permanent there.. & not moving ..!!~~~ it was looking like that it was sticken at that position only!!! it was just like a star .. but was extremely bright!!! and the strange thing is that it showed some weird strange activities from the sky....!!~ when i tried to click it's photos from my normal phone.., it just do not allowed me to click it photos.. when i was trying to photo shoot it .. it was just dancing & moving here & there on my phone screen.. it was completely weird..!!~ it was just like the other permanent star.. but actually was looking like the ufo-star craft!!~ 
i can't say anything any more detailed.. it was just a unbelievable..
i was in a big problem.. & i was thrown outside the house during my family fight..I was kept outside the house for due to some family issue..!! i was outside the house & i was standing.. that time , i just saw it... ufo!!~ 
i gonna be the ufo-scientist.. & i was just 16teen year old that time.. now.., soon i will be 18teen.. & i also made ufo-contacts many a times.. i tried to contact ufo's & then i saw it during the event!!~! it was a miracle that i saw ufo in my real problem!!~ i got some powers to contact the ufo's by my mind.. i also did one experiment to contact ufo.. & i was success.. i also got some of their responses.. & many a times also seen many ufo's!!~
ufo sighting in margao, goa on april 30th 2015 - i just saw a star-like ufo strange sighting in the sky in the gogal, margao at the place where i leaves...!!~

content.detailedDescription:
We were participating in an astrology tour at a parking lot located at kapalua airport in maui, hawaii. 

we setup a go-pro night lapse facing the night sky and came across footage of what seems like a ufo. 

we never witnessed the ufo until we went home and went through the footage. 

any type of explanation of this phenomenon would be highly appreciated.
content.summary: Ufo picture evidence at kapalua airport, maui

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went out to take some recycling, i was thinking that i never see fireballs in the sky, not that what this was.I spotted what i first thought was maybe a red glowing firework, it was just above the tree line,it appeared to pulse that's why i thought maybe it's firework fading, but then it got stronger and i found that odd, i went and put my glasses on to take get a better look, it was much clearer that this was not a firework but more like a beacon, the only problem with that was there are no beacons that i have ever seen around here and the nearest airport is ten miles not to mention we hardly ever get any air traffic over here. i got my lower power binoculars and got a better glimpse, at one point it seemed like it was reflecting the glow below it, it started to get foggy. i went inside to get my cell phone to record it, when i came back it was still there, we both saw it, but it was too far and to weak to show up on the the cell camera. it also appeared to have moved to out left somewhat visible between trees, we both saw two glowing lights side by side separated by what would be about 4 fingers from out distance, the lights looked like to glowing red beady eyes to us it was very eerie and left us with a very uneasy feeling,we continued to try to observe it, but we lost sight of it.  i turned on the police scanner to see if there were any reports of anything unusual in the sky but there was not, the whole sighting lasted roughly about 8 mins. hopefully someone else saw this, that is reading this and perhaps can explain better what it was.
content.summary: Observed glowing red light on the horizon, fog approaching from coast.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were relaxing in the alvord hot springs near fields oregon when my friend pointed at something in the sky. looking towards the south we observed one blinking light following close behind what looked like a satellite. as the objects moved closer we could hear the sound of the jet in the back, but the object in front made no noise. as the two objects came over head moving towards the north, the jet got much closer to the unknown object in a short amount of time, yet the object continued to stay in front until it was out of sight.
content.summary: Uknown flying object persued at a high rate of speed by a jet of some sort

content.detailedDescription:
Please help.... on 9/7/15 about 5:15am (sun into mon) i was not able to sleep so i went on my terrace. i was sitting in my chair looking out to the sky because i knew the sun was about to come up. behind me the sky was very dark in front of me it was starting to get lighter and then i witnessed a bright non moving white light in the sky. it wasn't flashing at all. it was not moving in any direction. there was no sound of any kind. to the right i could see the moon,some stars and the sky was clear.

i took a video. when i started it, it was dark then as you can see in this clip, the sun's coming up which makes the light a bit clearer. there was no doubt that something was just sitting there. i also took a picture and when i enlarge it it looks weird it's not so round as it looks from afar. it was almost bean shape but i do understand there was distortion in the enlargement.This is co-op city.The view in the video is of the neighboring buildings,park and bridge into city island. nothing but water after that. you can see the flashing lights from the bridge on the right side of the video. so i believe it looks like it was hovering over the water. 

after about 15 min i went to bed. there's nothing i could do. what's weird is i always see planes passing to land in queens every few minutes. during this time no planes crossed. coming or going. 

i wouldn't have said anything but later that evening i saw a post a facebook friend posted up earlier.It was the same footage,from their phone from manhattan at 5:10am. that was the same time frame when i saw it.I remembered in that moment that i also had a recording. 

less than 24hrs about 10 pm i go back on the terrace and now there is nothing in that area. i also have that video, and everything that was in the other video is in this video except that white light.

i've never experienced anything like this before and i figured i come here for help.
content.summary: witnessed a bright non moving  light in the sky. it wasn't flashing at all. it was not moving in any direction. there was no sound of any kind. to the right i could see the moon and stars

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting out side looking at the stars and had been there for at least 15 minutes before my wife noticed something very strange.  she asked "what is that" and then proceeded to run into the house because she was scared!  i looked up in the sky and saw a red amber glow at a very far distance flyng through the sky at a high rate of speed.  this object looked as if it had 2 main lights but had a blurry look to it.  the shape reminded me of a pyramid or of a boomerang.   the object had shape unlike any  of the the regular night objects that move through the sky.  it was the most amazing thing i have ever seen in the sky!  it moved so fast through the sky you could tell it was nothing of this earth!  while i observed this object it reminded me of a huge bird but no bird ( based on spherical shape of obeject) i know glowed likes this did!  i hope other s saw this as well because it was the best evidence i have seen of a ufo in my lifetime.
content.summary: Glowing red amber odd shape flying very fast through the sky.  nothing like it seen before

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my duplex smoking a cigar at first it just appeared as a normal aircraft light source but when it got closer to me i could clearly see that it was a triangle shape but more delta winged.When it got right above my head two very bright white belly lights came on they were brighter than a car's headlights they were on for 3 to 4 seconds and then they turned off i got the feeling they were internal or cabin lights not external lights.It flew north and then just vanished.After it'seems diaper ancestors i felt like i had had a burst of adrenalin i am still feeling this way. i have sketched what i saw but don'the know how to attach it as i am on a tablet, i didn'the get any photos of the object.
content.summary: Flying from south to north, as it got just over my head bright white belly lights lit tail lights were dim predominately red and dim white just vanished from sight
